title: 0. Ahoy, matey!
narrative: Avast ye landlubbers! Welcome aboard UltrAI where we be plunderin' the seven seas of artificial intelligence! We've got a whole crew of AI buccaneers—GPT-4, Claude, and Gemini—all workin' together to find ye the finest treasure of answers. Pay only fer what ye use, most queries be less than a doubloon! No subscriptions, no walkin' the plank. Arrr!

title: 1. Chart yer course
narrative: What be yer quest today, sailor?

title: 2. State yer business
narrative:
Tell the crew what ye be needin', savvy? The more details ye provide, the better treasure we'll find fer ye!

☠️ Got a map or document? Upload it fer better navigation (costs 10 pieces o' eight more)

title: 3. Battle strategy
narrative: How should the crew tackle this voyage?

options.label: Full Crew Assembly ⚓
options.description: All hands on deck! Combine the wisdom of all AI pirates into one grand answer

options.label: Truth Seeker (Soon, me hearties)
options.description: Check the facts across all navigators to avoid scurvy lies

options.label: Mutiny Mode (Soon, ye scallywags)
options.description: Make the AIs challenge each other in combat of wits

options.label: Crew Consensus (Soon, aye)
options.description: See where the crew agrees and where they be feudin'

title: 4. Choose yer crew
narrative: Which AI buccaneers be joinin' this expedition?

options.label: Admiral's Fleet (finest ships)
options.hint: GPT-4 + Claude flagships, 1-2 gold coins per quest

options.label: Swift Sloop (speedy vessels)
options.hint: Quick sailin', 50 cents to a doubloon

title: 5. Plunder more treasures?
narrative: Add some extra booty to yer haul, matey?
